website_summaries.verdict: A good alternative if you are looking for a model that also helps alleviate pain. Otherwise, consider others we reviewed.
pros: Provides a cooling effect that eases puffy eyes and pain
cons: It's bulkier and heavier than other models we tested
Not ideal if your goal is sound sleep

website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not for everyone, it has earned praise from consumers who like its design and functions. The interior beads are a selling point for the massaging effect they provide.
pros: An innovative eye mask that provides soothing symptom relief with a contoured fit, light compression, and Erobead fill
Placing it in the fridge/freezer adds a cooling effect
cons: Has a subpar band that has been known to break, and isn't adjustable
Some users found it too heavy and bulky to provide relief from various symptoms

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT HEAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this as a cold mask. I accidentally mixed it up with another mask I have and popped it in the microwave for 30 seconds on 50% power. BAD IDEA. Toxic smoke, melted mask and cracked glass tray in now ruined microwave. Don't try this at home! Cold only.
customer_reviews.author: C M Mack

customer_reviews.title: A must have for headache, migraine tool kits!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for migraines, tension, headaches. It cools the eye area. It’s incredibly soft if you can’t stand to feel texture while experiencing a migraine. I keep it in a plastic bag in the freezer so it won’t pick up smells. I thinks it’s filled with gel beads to hold the coldness in. It has two hooks to make it tighter if needed. The minute I put it on, I have relief. I don’t take meds for my migraines yet. I am hesitant to go trust route. I turn of the lights and put headphones on and have to lay down. This keeps out all light even near the nose area. It’s hands down a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn A.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought because I saw it was. the bomb. It is a great fabric that doesn't irritate my skin, the area where your eyes would be is great indented so it doesn't bother my eyes, and the band doesn't make it to tight. Only reason I'm not head over heels about it like what seemed most, is because it doesn't stay cold very long. I have awful migraines and am always having to hold eye packs and I thought this would nip that problem. Not a chance. Stays cold for a hot second even being in the freezer a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Imitation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for the exact same eye mask that I bought 10 years ago. How disappointing. This is a cheap imitation, made in China, inferior quality and much smaller than the original. It is sewn together crooked is bigger on one side than the other. Of course that’s what you get when it’s made in China. This is a cheap, flimsy, HORRIBLE replacement for the original. I am so sad that I lost my 10-year-old mask!! Cheap Chinese CRAP. It probably has some chemical on it that’s going to give my face a rash and eat my skin off when I wear it. Can’t wait...
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep
customer_reviews.text: This weighted eye mask helps me sleep. It relieves pressure in my forehead and blocks out all light. If I've had a long day, I use it to relax; not just to sleep. I do wish it was a little heavier though.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years ago I bought one for myself, best eye mask I ever had. Love love the cool feeling, the beads that form to your face giving you complete darkness. I then bought them as godparent christmas gifts. Just recently my sister-in-law asked where I bought it she needed another and settling for others she found wasnt cutting it. After 2 yrs mine has a stretched elastic band so I have my next one bought and waiting. Oh bought my husband one for this past christmas so he would stop stealing mine lol
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I was so hopeful but this is not the mask for migraines
customer_reviews.text: I had so much hope for this eye mask! Thought finally! Someone understands what i need! I suffer from migraines 3-5 times a week... However, this mask was of no help at all for me. I quickly woke up with sweat covering my face where the mask was set on me. Very nasty & with a migraine doing anything at all is a struggle. So getting up to get cleaned up was not pleasant. Such a bummer I was so hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Stylinforu

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for headaches and sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this eye mask because I lost my first on vacation. I LOVE this thing. I have sensory issues and it’s very difficult for me to sleep with any light, but it’s also difficult to have things on my eyes. This mask is great because it’s got indentation in the middle of each side and I can actually open my eyes with it on! I put it in the freezer almost every day; it helps with headaches but I also just really like the cool feeling anyway. The pressure on my face took a little getting used to when I first got one but it only bothered me for the first couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great for insomnia and headaches
customer_reviews.text: Great eye mask. The sewn patches over the eyes keep it from pressing against eyelids/eyelashes, the tiny beads are super comfortable, and the whole thing fits really well to block out almost all light. It works really well in the fridge or freezer. I actually bought this for my husband, who has a hard time falling and staying asleep, and he commented on its effectiveness right away. I find it useful for headaches, myself, and I liked it so much I bought another mask for myself. I put a few drops of lavender oil on mine, and it holds the scent really nicely. Great purchase, I would definitely recommend over other masks I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: RMD

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who is 23 gets violent migraines. Nothing was working -not ice, not heat. not tying a scarf around his head-so I got him this mask, According to him it works like a dream especially if you keep it in the freezer or refrigerator I also use the same mask for my stress headaches and it works every time even at room temperature
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to the mask, made eyes itch
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear. However not easy to wash (the main thing would be how to dry in time to avoid getting mildew). Bad design on the elastic band in the back, not even adjustable. And very thin and flimsy. Felt great putting the cold on, but wasn't big enough to hit the full sinus cavities on my cheek bones or over towards the temples. Better than nothing, but a cold washcloth might do better - just wouldn't last as long. To top that off, I only wore the mask for 5 minutes, I woke up with itchy eyes. Maybe allergic to whatever is inside the thing or the chemicals used to treat the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The mask itself can serve it’s purpose. Unfortunately the 1st time I went to use it I began adjusting the strap in the back & the plastic adjuster broke. I can’t adjust it now to properly fit on my head so it’s of no use to me. Quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: This should be a medical device
customer_reviews.text: My wife gets crazy migraine headaches and nothing really works for her other than going to a dark and quiet place for while. I bought this mask while researching migraine medications, and it has been a miracle product. We keep it in the freezer (in a zip lock bag) and when the migraine hits, my wife puts this on for about 20 minutes and it makes a world of difference. I've used it for a headache too and it's fantastic. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Syed I. Hashmi

customer_reviews.title: Seller customer service is worse than the product
customer_reviews.text: Due to the weight and size of the package I knew something was off when it arrived. I opened the packaging and the product box halfway and was totally disappointed. While the material is soft the mask itself is heavy and clunky. I only took it out of the box halfway because you can tell by the weight it's too heavy for sleeping. Worse than that was their customer service. They were not willing to help with a refund in anyway and ultimately I had to contact Amazon directly to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: You need this (even if you think you dont)
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually wear eye masks, and to be honest I don't really know why I bought this. But I am so glad I did! I dont keep it in the fridge or anything, but this mask is always so cooling to the face. It's just heavy enough to be comforting and soothing. The fabric is soft and it somehow stays on me all night (I've never had an eye mask not slip off in the night). I put it on, and it lulls me right to sleep. Maybe it's because I can't open my eyes, or maybe its because its like a weighted blanket for your eyeballs. Either way, this is fantastic and I'm never sleeping without it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aryn Geier

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect (but works somewhat) for migraines but still highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This mask works well in the cooling area, but not for longevity. It stays cool for approximately 20-30min and then within an hr is room temp. I do use it for when a I know a migraine is coming on to help prevent getting a full-blown migraine. However, it's not as effective once I have a full-blown migraine. It does make a great mask for puffy eyes and blocking out light. It's super light and extremely comfortable to sleep in. It's very helpful during allergy season. I own 3 of these and use them all the time. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Court0517

customer_reviews.title: Relief for a migraine sufferer
customer_reviews.text: I experience frequent migraines and headaches, and my work requires being on a computer all which is really hard on the eyes. This mask helps with sleep and with relaxing after work, not sure if it's because it's weighted but it has helped improve sleep and decrease pressure/pain around the eyes, which for me has =less migraines and headaches. I am really grateful to the inventor of this. Fellow migraine sufferers would understand how finding something that does not involve taking medications and actually works is like finding a bucket of gold.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbalie

customer_reviews.title: This eye pillow is heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always interested in a better sleep mask, as my sinuses swell easily. However, since my sinuses already hurt at bedtime, this mask would have kept me awake, so I took it off almost immediately. Cold gel masks don't stay cold very long, but they are light weight and work better for me than this mask. It must go back.
customer_reviews.author: dcmimi

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out light, nice for sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of different sleep masks. This is the best by far. My room gets very light and this blocks it all out which I love! Regular masks usually let in light because they don’t fit around the bridge of the nose. This one fits snug. I like to put it in the freezer during the day so it’s nice and cool to put on when I go to bed. My eyes don’t seem as puffy in the morning. The only negative I have is the elastic band that goes around your head seems a bit flimsy for the weight of the mask. It could do with a thicker (width) piece of elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: If you like weighted blankets... this is your sleep mask!
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing is that I have bought so many of them because now I need them to sleep. I swear I do not sleep nearly as well without it. It’s enough weight to be soothing, but not overwhelming. I love this eye mask, I have had many. Sometimes, after many months of use, the elastic will loosen, but really easily solver by just knotting the back tighter. I have had so many sleeping masks, this is BY far. Especially if you enjoy a weighted blanket and or a heavy blanket and find that soothing. The pressure is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Eye Socket Pain
customer_reviews.text: Can we just have a conversation about how great this mask is? I have chronic migraines, and sometimes my migraines also come with pain around my eye socket. It's the WORST. I don't know how, but this mask does wonders for that nagging pain around my eyes. It also works very nicely as a sleep mask, and I think that it actually helps me fall asleep faster even when I don't have any pain. The compression helps me to keep my eyes closed and not darting around, which physically keeps me from thinking so much. At least I think. :P
customer_reviews.author: Kimpropriety

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask, Horrible Band
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this mask, and the eye part of the mask is great. Where this product REALLY misses the mark is with the strap. I legitimately laughed out loud when I opened it up and saw that this bulky, weighted eye mask had the SMALLEST elastic band I've ever seen on a sleep mask (and I've bought a lot over the years). Seriously, this strap is so dinky and honestly uncomfortable. I highly doubt they tested this product with the strap, because it can't hold crap and rubs the ears raw.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Lousy elastic band
customer_reviews.text: The mask itself is comfortable and has a nice weight to it. However, the elastic band is so thin and has become practically useless. It has overstretched and frayed. Perhaps, if this had better elastic or a Velcro attachment it would be worth the purchase. It isn't. I am going to end up throwing it out... Which really bugs me.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Mask
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars because it actually stopped a migraine in it's path. It was a bit lighter than I was expecting, but after putting it in the freezer for a few hours, it felt great on my tired eyes. Most of my migraines start behind my eyes so it really helps me. I am shocked how fast the mask starts to help. It's very versatile. You can put it in the freezer for headaches, migraines, tired eyes, or puffiness; or you you could use it for travel, car rides, or sleeping in the daytime. It's great at blocking out light, and feels super relaxing. I highly recommend this if you travel, have tired eyes, migraines, or tension headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Headaches!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I have a hard time falling asleep if there is any light in the room. I had seen this eye mask recommended on several amazon lists, but was putting it off because I thought it was a little pricey for a face mask. I finally decided to order it and definitely do not regret the purchase! It obviously does the job of keeping any light away, but the weighted nature of the masks helps with headaches and provides a cooling effect. My boyfriend sometimes steals it from me when he has migraines, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kane

customer_reviews.title: IMAK Compression Mask - Migraines
customer_reviews.text: This product is like a weighted blanket for your face. One reviewer suggested buying 2 masks, one for the freezer on the days that you need an ice pack. I'm glad I took their advice. This product IS NOT an ice pack but is able to stay cold/cool for approx 20mins. This isn't a Migraine cure-all, but it is one of the best products I've ever bought for my chronic migraines. I highly, highly recommend it. My next purchase? A weighted blanket that has exceptional reviews & doesn't cause me to go bankrupt.
customer_reviews.author: Gin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Even my kids love it. Buy  spares
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was avail for purchase again. I can't get it back from my kids. They love it. I can't wait to try it between the kids fighting over it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a severely damaged box. The mask appeared to have been used. It was covered in hair and smelled like old essential oils. Since this item can not be returned, I will have to keep it. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail M.

customer_reviews.title: Best out of about five diff masks I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple years ago. This is great. The 'weighted' element turns out to help a lot (to my surprise). The sewn eye areas clearing your eyes makes it way better than every other mask I've had. The beads inside allow you to sort of form/shape it around your face for ideal light blocking and comfort. My only complaint is the strap is too thin for the weight of it and the wear. Eventually it stretched out useless and I had to tie a knot in it to make it short enough to fit my head again. But the mask itself is cool.
customer_reviews.author: P Gaenir

customer_reviews.title: I suffer with intense migraines and I am very sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with intense migraines and I am very sensitive to light during a migraine. This mask blacks out all light without adding any felling of constriction around my head.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful, but elastic stretches out.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful. As someone who has chronic migraines, especially behind the eyes, I love it. It puts pressure on the eyes to help relieve the pain. The ONLY thing I wish it had was a velcro strap instead of an elastic one, so I could adjust the pressure around my head. I would be more than willing to pay more for this product if it had one. Also, the elastic stretches out and it no longer is useful. If had to tie a knot in it to make it tighter to keep it around my head and soon will have to buy a new one. It will be worth it purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I receive it a day earlier than I thought, it also gets cold quickly too. I do have migraines that include occular pain/pressure but also sinus pain (yay Ohio Valley allergies...). I used it a couple times yesterday and it was great. It’s soft and just the right amount of weight for compression. I slept with it last night and it was very comfortable. I’m really happy with this purchase. I will definitely recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I bought one for the whole family. In a tech environment, it's easy to keep your head running after watching a screen for X number of hours. The light pressure of the beads is soothing. My 12yo son loves this! It definitely helps him sleep faster. I even got him another for when he sleeps at his other mother's house. Adjusting to different households must be a bit stressful for a child. This helps him relax in both houses. Anything for consistency!
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Actually helps with migranes
customer_reviews.text: When my wife asked for this, I never thought for a moment it would help with her migranes. There are a thousand snake-oil supposed 'cures' and 'remedies' out there, and I thought this would be just another in a slew of failed attempts to help her pain. This is the only thing we've purchased that actually helps. Not medicine, not ten trips to a specialist. It doesn't get rid of them entirely, but she says it brings her pain down from an 8 to a 3. It means she can work again, and seeing her smile was worth any expense. We immediately purchased two more. Thank you for everything you do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye mask. I’m prone to headaches and having the slight pressure from this and the coolness from keeping it in the fridge feel so good on my eyes. It is super comfy. I do wear it at night because it blocks out all light. It forms around your eyes and nose easily. There may be areas around your nose that some light can get through but you can easily use your fingers to fix it. Sometimes it may slide off during the night but if I wake up, I just put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Fulltimemom2014

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I do have trouble sleeping with it only because it’s a little bulky and I sleep on my side and it gets in the way. But it really does help my headaches sooo much! I keep it in the fridge and the coldness lasts a while when I’m wearing it. Between the pressure and the coolness it relieves my headaches enough that I can function. My friends boyfriend also gets frequent migraines so she bought him one and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: kiana

customer_reviews.title: It works and doesn’t cause pressure on eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eye mask. It is advertised as having “Unique stitching alleviates direct pressure on eyes,” and that is true. I feel the cold around my eyes but not that heaviness I’ve experienced from other eye masks. It really helps manage headaches that cause eye pain. It is also helpful to block out light, which is so helpful, when you have a wicked headache. It is so good that I ordered one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonIng

customer_reviews.title: Must have for headache sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from cluster headaches and this has been a god send for me. The cool pressure around my eyes helps immensely. I recommend this to everyone I know who suffers headaches. I use it every night, too, and the elastic works for a while. I eventually tie knots to make it shorter when it stretches out and eventually get a new one every few months. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for migraines
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for my migraine headaches! Good weight (for people who want pressure on their eyes bc they feel like they're going to pop out of their head), good fit (not too tight), and I like the beads inside. Stays cold longer than ice pack, icepacks can be too cold right out of the freezer. This is tolerable to put right on from freezer. My kids like it too. Seems well made and price is good. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H123

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many eye masks throughout the years and none of them have been this comfortable! I store it in the freezer in a freezer bag and use it in the morning if my eyes are swollen or to help me fall asleep at night. The pressure is just right and it keeps cool for a good amount of time. Also, because it's made of cloth rather than plastic it fits your face like a glove. I love it and will be buying more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: The Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask, it is the perfect size for my face and the weight of the mask definitely helps you relax and get to sleep. The strap it uses in the back would benefit from a size adjustable option because it is too tight around my head. The fabric tends to make my undereyes itchy but I think that is more a sensitive skin problem than the product itself. Overall a pretty good but, blocks out most of the light, I wouldn't suggest if you are a side sleeper the strap is not that strong and the mask doesn't hold right.
customer_reviews.author: Amb02person

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for migraine sufferers and light sleepers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, just received yesterday as I have been struggling with migraines really bad this week. I put it in a Ziploc bag in the freezer and was happy with how cold but still flexible and not uncomfortable it was. I used it all night even after the cold wore off and while I did need to adjust it around my eyes a bit (still felt squished sometimes) it helped me get some of the best sleep I've had in a long time. I'm a light sleeper and I wasn't bothered by the TV being on or a light getting turned on. I would recommend this product and may buy a second one too.
customer_reviews.author: tim kraker

customer_reviews.title: Not great; I’m confused about the great reviews
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but found it didn’t conform very well to my face - and as a result it didn’t work to darken fully or distribute its weight to my face effectively. the head strap was poor quality, uncomfortable, and did not adjust adequately - and my head is of average or below average circumference. I didn’t find that it reduced sinus pressure or it helped with my occasional headaches. there are better masks out there at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool, soft, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this mask when I come home from work with a headache. It stays cold for quite a while. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars for sleep is because I feel like it might be a little heavy to sleep with. I like that it does have some weight because it offers just enough pressure to feel secure. It doesn't have gaps to let in light. I love it for migraines. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dbrad

customer_reviews.title: This mask is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I was a bit skeptical when I received this mask. But after using it for several days now, it has become a necessity! It has a comforting weight to it that has really helped my headaches unlike other masks I have tried. It takes a few minutes to adjust to it, but it really helps! I have slept much more soundly the last several nights. I use it with a “headache balm” I also got on Amazon & they are a great combination in my battle against headaches. Even without a headache, I’m used to wearing this mask now & I won’t be going back to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these, having lost the first one in a move. You keep it in the freezer for when that headache-behind-the-eye strikes, and it really helps, cooling and preventing light from getting to your eyes. I hope to find my first one and have two, because the mask will thaw out within a certain span of time (thinking back, it might be about a half hour as I recall). But even that half hour can help a lot, give your aspirin a little head start on easing the headache.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I have to sleep with a sleeping mask because my girlfriend cant sleep without the TV on, and I cant sleep without any light. Needless to say, I have been through scores of sleeping masks throughout my adult life. This is simply the best sleeping mask that I have ever had. Put it in the fridge, or don't... this mask just feels fantastic over your eyes. Trust me.. Its my second one.. and not because the first one broke... I lost it. I would recommend this to anybody who is looking for a sleeping mask that blacks out all light. The only thing that I would change, is the ability to make it tighter/looser around your head.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Greene

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooling eyemask
customer_reviews.text: Initially on the first use you think whoa, heavy, but it only feels like the first use. Its actually stress relieving in a “weighted blanket for your face” manner. It’s nice and cooling, and you can manipulate the tiny beads to block all light, or push up and away from sinus area. Only thing that could be improved, bigger eye socket, as I have lash extensions. Still, my favorite eye mask so far.
customer_reviews.author: nebraskacool

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eye mask to block the light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help block the light during migraines. I haven’t used it as a cold compress yet. But it has just the right weight, no scent & blocks light really well. All pluses when suffering from a migraine or just a badly needed snooze. It’s stitched well and soft fabric. No need to spot clean the surface either. It’s washable as long as you don’t use heat drying. So I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I use it for headaches mostly but sometimes i will sleep with it too. It works great! One down fall is this is my second one for the first one the got a big hole in it and i couldn't sew it up and lost a lot of the beads. Hopefully it doesn't happen to this one. But do t let that stop you from buying. The plastic band to keep it on is a little tight for my comfort it again that's just a preference. Otherwise i love this and use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Petitti

customer_reviews.title: Crap design, not adjustable, not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: The mask has so much weight on the nose piece/improperly designed that it feels like the weight is suffocating me and making it hard to breathe through my (normal sized, female) nose. Also the elastic strap isn’t adjustable so it’s either falling off (me) or constricting (SO). If you have the Goldilocks head this was meant for maybe it’ll work for you. Also won’t accept a return so it’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Then is a Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, unless I truly enjoy the product but I think this sleep mask as improved my quality of sleep. I suffer from mild insomnia and even with sleep aids and standard sleeping mask, I can’t always sleep well. But with this mask, it’s light out - literally. Not only is the weight element, a relaxing and calming sensation but the darkness is undeniable. I woke up in the mornings completely startled by the sunlight, I had no idea it was morning. I almost forget where I was. Definitely a great product for sleeping or resting.
customer_reviews.author: moraiahvayl

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: The way they stitch together the eye areas prevent pressure from being put on the eye lids.. something I was looking for. Saw other reviews suggested putting it in the freezer.. so I’ll try that. My only problem is that I’m a stomach sleeper and with the eye mask being a bit bulky.. shifts it to the side so I do go between this one and a flatter mask. But that’s on me and my crazy sleeping ways 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away from this
customer_reviews.text: The product was not factory sealed and looked used when opened. Still, we sanitized best we could and tried it for a few minutes. Next day, had very itchy eye (possibly infected). This was possibly a used product - due to COVID-19, the risks of going to doctor to get it looked at is greater than just adding eye drops and letting it play out (hopefully get better). And the product has a NO RETURN POLICY. If you purchase, make sure it arrives sealed and if it doesn't don't use!
customer_reviews.author: LAXAG

customer_reviews.title: UNACCEPTABLE
customer_reviews.text: This mask was used had stains and pet hair. I am disgusted and the fact that I am not allowed to return it is disrespectful!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pham

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: First off, this item is NONREFUNDABLE and secondly its effectiveness is hit or miss depending on the person. Wearing it only kept me up at night because the weight was off putting and the fit was uncomfortable. I bought it on a whim hoping to help improve my poor sleep quality but just made it worst and now im stuck with this useless product. A regretful purchase, if your unsure avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Non-Adjustable Band, No Instructions Included
customer_reviews.text: The elastic band is cheaply made—I don’t expect it to last long—and is NOT adjustable. Consequently, the elastic is tight fitting, further exacerbating my headache! (My hat size is average—man’s 7 1/4 to 7 3/8). And...there are NO instructions included in any of the three boxes I purchased. So, I have no idea how long to leave it in the freezer or refrigerator, once chilled—how long it remains effective, etc. Cheap company.
customer_reviews.author: P Martin

customer_reviews.title: Okay, Fine, Sure.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is fine. The band is flimsy and doesn't hold the mask in place well if you are used to moving around when you sleep, but it works fine as long as you are lying on your back. I think the pressure will be effective in keeping my eyes closed on nights where I have troubles sleeping as well as keeping my forehead muscles from contracting. I simply wish that the mask was better made.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayRoseEliz

customer_reviews.title: Bought two
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant and I've been having headaches and trouble sleeping. Someone recommended that I get a mask to wear. This one hugs around my eyes and stays in place. It's a little tricky to tighten but that could just be because I'm uncoordinated. My husband works nights so I bought him one for his day sleeping and he swears by it. He's gotten such great sleep since we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Strap is very small, no returns to be weary
customer_reviews.text: The mask is soft, but the strap is way way too short and tight on my head and I’ve woken up with a headache every night I’ve worn it. Maybe I got a child size by mistake? I had hoped to contact and exchange or return but they do not allow it. It is NOT adjustable. Those are plastic covered wire just to fold the strap in transit, I could not adjust it because it just bent and came off, which the strap was still way too short. Just pretty disappointed I spent so much on something that is CAUSING me headaches and I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: I put my masks in the freezer for extra relief. I’ve purchased probably 10 Of these for myself and family members. Only one mask has gotten a tear in the seam, and that was after several months of use. I’ve tried a few other masks, some similar, some very different, but this one is absolutely my favorite. I have multiple so that I always have a cold one. My son, who is 5, now requests to wear one on hot nights, my husband & I both wear them nightly, and my mother, 65, also uses this mask. It is Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kbator

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I've used that actually works. When you deal with migraines, nothing else honestly matters. For the $9 it costs, seriously folks, if the elastic band wears down (because that happens with elastic) get a new one, or replace the elastic. I'd really rather NOT have something more significant pressing on the back of my skull when I've got a headache, so I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Showell

customer_reviews.title: If you have headaches, you NEED this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have headaches and migraines, often with pain behind my eyes. I put this in the freezer and it really did help a TON! It was so comfortable I ended up sleeping with it on the entire night! I’m so happy with this and recommend it to anyone with frequent headaches!
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out the sun really well
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this mask. It's basically a beanbag. That might not sound appealing at first, but it means it automatically forms a good seal every time. It has indents so your eyelashes don't scrape on the inside and because of the "airiness," it stays cool. It's a little bulky compared to fabric ones, but that hasn't gotten in the way of me falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask!! It’s so nice especially when I have a tension headache. It has a nice weight and feels good over my eyes. I store it in a zip bag and put in my freezer and I make sure I grab it before bed. It’s so nice , pitch black when in use. Husband likes to read before bed so the light won’t even bother me. Wish I knew about this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee_Sipper15

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: So I can’t get enough of these imak eye masks. Love the soft beaded filling in the masks. Very soothing and comfortable on the eye. I’ve misplaced mine a couple of times so I own 3 of them now. But they are well worth the money and oh so comfy. Would make a great stocking stuffer or a gift for anyone. Keeps light out & you can freeze them and they aren’t like a solid block of ice. Good deal and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer jordan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: This sleep mask is pretty good. It's nice and dark. I like the heaviness of it. It might not be good for someone with very long eyelashes. The main negative is the strap is long and thin, so it sometimes slips off my head over night. I will have to find a way to put a different strap on it. It would be nice if they made it with an adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Great mask but makes my eyes swell
customer_reviews.text: Okay I love this sleep mask. It brings instant relief and is soooooooo relaxing the minute you put it on. It stay on great through the night EXCEPT my eyes have some kind of allergy to whatever is in it. They are puffy/itchy/crusty when I use just this mask. I don’t have any allergies I know of so maybe it’s a chemical used in the mask. I can’t use it which is such a bummer because otherwise it’s an awesome mask!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for frequent migraine and headache sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from frequent migraine headaches and this is one of the best cold treatments I have ever used. A compression mask is a therapy I have never tried and it truly makes a difference. I would recommend this to anyone who has frequent headaches or migraines. The only reason I gave it four stars is because the band is a little tight for someone with a bad headache but I'm going to cut the band and sew velcro tabs so that I can adjust it to make it more comfortable. It also stays cold much longer than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, no “massage”
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had compression products that feel like a massage. This ain’t it. The mask is just alright. Didn’t notice any relief on my headache, but at least it didn’t blur my vision like the last compression mask I tried. That one was great but didn’t have the eye holes. If only I could combine them, perhaps I would have a useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Migraine sufferers, this is the one true mask
customer_reviews.text: I have tried way too many masks for my migraines This mask though? I have two and I feel like I need twelve. I leave them in my freezer at all times, and when a migraine is coming on I go straight for these. They’re comfortable enough that you can fall asleep with them on, they stay cold for a decent amount of time (longer than most that I’ve tried), and they bring a good amount of relief.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works great!
customer_reviews.text: It fits nice and snug but doesn't put extra pressure on my eyes when I have a migraine. Doesn't get so cold that you have to wrap it in a towel either. It's the best comfort product I have ever found to help ease a migraine pain when all I want to do is lay in the dark and try to sleep it off. I'm buying another one today, but found out that it qualifies for my HSA account so I'm excited.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: weighted compression as well as beads conform about eyes/nose and block light
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about a week and really like it. I liked the idea of weighted compression as well as beads conform about eyes/nose and block light really well. I read other reviews about the strap and I agree this is a dinky piece of elastic compared to the overall quality and deducted one star. I for see having to replace with a thicker/stronger piece of elastic hand sewed on as it will stretch out over time/with wear
customer_reviews.author: SP in NC

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: You need this. It’s been over a year since I’ve slept through the night. The last 2 weeks have been the most restful sleep I can remember. I put it in the freezer all day and grab it before bed and once I put this thing on, I’m a goner. I got it for headaches and while it helps that- the sleep is what I can’t get over!- Prime Wife
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased because I accidentally left the first one in a hotel. It's exactly the right amount of pressure for migraine relief and blocks out the light at the same time. Chilling it helps a lot, too. It's very high quality, the first one went through multiple trips, tons of use and rough handling without even so much as a snag or stitch out of place. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JLL

customer_reviews.title: Everyone in the family loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband looks at a computer all day and uses it after work. My 7 yr old gets headaches whenever he forgets to wear his glasses and loves to use this. My 4 yr old got sunburned at the pool this past weekend and loved wearing this on his eyes. The added weight is the perfect amount and it doesn't get too cold for the eyes... just right!
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cutting out Light and Adding Appropriate Pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my husband who suffers from migraines and he absolutely loves it. He often gets a large amount of pressure behind his eyes, which this mask helps reduce during an episode. It blocks out all light for him and gives him pressure in all of the right places. He likes it so much that he uses it even when he doesn't have a migraine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask because I get migraines. It had so many great reviews I had high expectations for it. Just didn't do the church for me. I was hoping that it would rain cruel on my face and give me some compression around white eyes because that's where I tend to get migraines and this Justin do anything for me
customer_reviews.author: Saralovesamazonprime

customer_reviews.title: Great, but some room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I still love this thing, but I would love it more if (1) the elastic was adjustable and (2) it stayed cold as long as the gel bead ones do. It's still a lot more comfortable than the other ones I've tried and I feel like I get more relief from it because it gets closer to my eyelids without putting too much pressure on them. Beware that if you have a big head though, it's probably going to be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Abel

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cold long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask because I get sinus headaches almost daily. Although it does relieve some pressure it does not stay cool long. That is my only complain. I keep mine in the freezer all day, and it only stays cool for about 15 minutes at the most. It does block out all the light when i nap during the day. Good product but I wish it stayed cold longer.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I Love the mask so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He loved it so much I bought one for myself. I can’t believe how well It blocked out light. I love to leave it in the freezer for extra relief. I’ve also added lavender to the outside for aromatherapy. The only thing would be, I wish the strap Was a little thicker or adjustable for variety of head sizes. I wake up and it’s fallen off in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Ruberti

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to explain it but it really works, I get migraines and headaches from my wisdoms growing in. I can’t get them removed yet and the pain has been unbearable with random headaches/migraines. The mask puts pressure around my eye and the beads in it stay cool. I started putting my mask in a ziplock bag then placing it in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin clavier

customer_reviews.title: Migraines Chill.
customer_reviews.text: As a migraine sufferer, I am always looking for something to help sooth my pain. COLD compression really helps me, and at first I was a little skeptical of how effective a cloth eyemask could be. Aftee the first use, I will never travel without it. It holds a cool temp for a while, but less than 30 min, however it feels frozen!!!! And that is just what I was looking for. Plus, this can also be a sleeping mask, and it effectively blocks out alllllll light. Again a win win in the migraine dept.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: When I have a migraine or headache, this mask really helps me relax and feel more at ease. I wouldn't say it cures them, but it definitely helps me take a nap when I need to get rid of one. Was exactly what I thought it would be and it reserves a space in my freezer with a baggy (to avoid freezer smells) at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Begovich

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand how this works, but it does
customer_reviews.text: I get tension headaches and migraines, and somehow this thing helps. I don't understand how, but as soon as I put it on, my headache gets significantly better. The fact that it still works with migraines is astounding to me. Maybe it's sorcery, but as long as it works, I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Michayla

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had migraines for years, this is the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had migraines for years, this is the first none medicinal thing that has helped. It doesn’t cure it but the weight of the mask, the coolness from the freezer and the fact that it blocks light all combine to be very effective. I’ll be purchasing at least one more for backup.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Put it on Straight from freezer
customer_reviews.text: This is really awesome. Super comfy, and not hard, harsh freezing, wet cold of gel and plastic eye masks. The coolness of the beads is perfect. Unfortunately the temp warms up pretty quickly. But usually, your puffed mess of an eye area has already gotten a little help by then. It keeps you on your back too, so the creases get some help too. Just don't let your drunk self forget it on the night table. Put it in the freezer Before you get wild, so it'll be there, ready for you when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Tumor Named Marla

customer_reviews.title: SO Grateful I Got This!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with tension headaches quite a bit and occassionally eye strain and this mask has been SUCH a blessing! I keep it in the freezer and pull out as needed. It is super soft and the beads, though lighter than I expected, add the perfect pressure to counteract how awful my head/eyes feel and help relax me. It is comfortable enough to wear to bed without issue or slipping and I LOVE it! Plus the price is fantastic for what you get I think. SO glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: USNPianoButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend who suffers from a lot of sinus congestion and headaches. The pressure of the mask helps her sleep and she told me that she wished she'd have known of it earlier! I'm a bit concerned with the quality of the strap but if she's happy I'm happy. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like having pressure on my eyes during a migraine. This does the trick. It feels cool right when you put it on, but warms up to skin temperature within a few minutes. I haven't tried putting it in the fridge/freezer beforehand, but can't imagine it staying cold for too long. As an added benefit, the weight of it allows it to mold to your face better so it actually blocks out more light that a normal eye mask. Only knock against it would be that it's bulkiness sometimes makes lying on your side awkward. But I'm happy with it, and have even ordered the same mask for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K.

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible migraines so my boyfriend got me this. I love this!! It’s great for headaches or full on migraines. It’s super comfy and soft, I’ve even fallen asleep sleeping on my face with this on. Only downside is the glass beads inside don’t hold the cold for very long and I don’t think you can heat them
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Enough with your Puffs?
customer_reviews.text: I use this ice pack every day to reduce puffs below my eyes. It’s so easy to use and I like how the stitched eyes are inset so they don’t push against my own eyes. This makes it more comfortable and also won’t mess up make up if you are wearing mascara. I don’t use the mask warmed (in microwave) very often, but I would imagine if you had a migraine or allergies, it would be most soothing.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought! Well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this to everyone! My best friend tried mine & got one immediately & I bought one for my sister & suggested it to my boss who, like me, suffers from migraines. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, put in ziplock when freezing
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this so much because I suffer from migraines. You can put it in the freezer and it’s so soothing and cool. The problem is that the cloth absorbs all the freezer smells. I would strongly recommend putting it in a ziplock and then in the freezer and then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pennick

customer_reviews.title: Heavier- cooling- good for migraines
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a sleep mask with a bit of weight and coolness to it for my migraines. I find sometimes I sleep better with a bit of this... but there are days I find this a bit too much weight as I wake with my eyes feeling heavy and a touch achy from that. Won’t use nightly/ just as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I get migraines about every other week. I had one coming on last night. I put on the cold mask (and with advil) and in about 20-30min it was subsiding. Advil alone usually doesn't work for me. I usually have to have caffeine too (but it was 8pm). Tldr; I'm really happy with this mask!!! And it's super soft on the face (I have sensitive skin and easily break out).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing delivers! Even my kids try to steal it when I break it out of the freezer. The beads are quite firm as opposed to the other freezer packs beads I've seen and felt that can actually squish and break- these won't do that! Also the cooling cotton fabric is SO nice against your skin and it conforms to your face shape well and is 100% effective at blocking out light. Works really great for back of neck area as well. I would definitely recommend this to friends! Even better it was Prime so I got it super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bogherie

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy w/Slight coolness - haven’t tried in freezer yet. I use when I have migraines & it helps - bought 1 for my husband, sister & sister-in-law- they all love it - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CelticKirk

customer_reviews.title: Discomfort/pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have two daughters who both suffer from migraines and this is one of their favorite relief products. I love it for relief from allergy eye discomfort. Consequently, we all have more than one in our freezers!
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Mask
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase this eye mask again. I love that I only needed to leave in the freezer just a few minutes before applying to my face. Completely contours to my face and fits nice and snug. It's not as comfortable when I lie on my side. I guess because of the weight, it feels like it may slide off my face. Nevertheless, it completely blocks out the light, feels soooo good when I have a headache and applies just the right amount of pressure to face and around the eyes, so super helpful for those with cluster headaches or migraines! Seem to get the most benefit from lying on my back though.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Ro G

product_meta.title: IMAK Compression Pain Relief Mask and Eye Pillow, Cold Therapy Headache, Migraine, Sinus Pain, Patented, Universal Size
product_meta.description: IMAK COMPRESSION PAIN RELIEF MASK / EYE PILLOW This eyemask pillow was designed by an orthopedic surgeon to provide relief from migraine headaches, tension headaches, sinus pain and eyestrain. Its unique, massaging ergoBeads provide a gentle massage effect around the eyes, while its patented stitching design alleviates direct pressure on eyes and keeps eyelashes from rubbing the inside of the mask. The IMAK Compression Pain Relief Mask is also great for relaxing, resting, meditation, alleviating travel strain, and providing eye relief after hours of computer work or gaming. Its weighted compression aids in the feeling of relaxation. You can store your IMAK headache eye mask in the freezer to provide soothing cool relief for tired and puffy eyes, without the harshness of ice or frozen gel packs. This weighted eye mask for sleeping conforms to the face and eyes to block out light, making it excellent for falling asleep and staying asleep. A durable elastic strap keeps the mask in place for side-sleepers. This sinus eye mask’s breathable cotton material is comfortable to wear and feels gentle against the skin. It is not made with natural rubber latex, eliminating the risk of allergic reactions.
feature_bullets: Pain-Relieving. This eyemask pillow was designed by an orthopedic surgeon to provide relief from migraine headaches, tension headaches, sinus pain and eyestrain. Its massaging ergoBeads provide a gentle massage effect around the eyes, while its patented stitching design alleviates direct pressure on eyes.

Soothing. The IMAK Compression Pain Relief Mask is also great for relaxing, resting, meditation, alleviating travel strain, and providing eye relief after hours of computer work or gaming. Its weighted compression aids in the feeling of relaxation.
Use It Chilled. You can store your IMAK headache eye mask in the freezer to provide soothing cool relief for tired and puffy eyes, without the harshness of ice or frozen gel packs.

Light-Blocking. This weighted eye mask for sleeping conforms to the face and eyes to block out light, making it excellent for falling asleep and staying asleep. A durable elastic strap keeps the mask in place for side-sleepers.

Comfortable. This sinus eye mask’s breathable cotton material is comfortable to wear and feels gentle against the skin. It is not made with natural rubber latex, eliminating the risk of allergic reactions.
